subject: Real Estate
title: Meta's Real Estate Retreat
description: A fast breakdown of Meta's Real Estate Retreat for builders.

hook.text: In 2022, Meta gave back 1.2 million square feet of New York office space it had leased just a year earlier.

buildup.text: Meta had been on a real estate spending spree, snapping up premium offices in every major city.

discovery.text: The metaverse bet and remote work shift made physical offices suddenly less essential.

twist.text: Meta took a $2.2 billion charge on abandoned lease obligations. Paid for space nobody would use.

punchline.text: Meta paid billions for offices it decided nobody needed.

quiz.question: Why did Meta return office space in 2022?
options: The metaverse bet and remote work shift
